placeholderImages.description: An inspector in a hard hat reviewing blueprints on a large construction site with a building frame in the background.
A stunning and complex modern architectural facade with geometric patterns and dramatic lighting.
A female engineer standing on a rooftop overlooking a city, holding a tablet and surveying the area.
An aerial drone shot of a futuristic, curved building with a unique, flowing design.
A close-up of a surveyor using a theodolite, with a blurred construction site in the background.
An interior shot of a massive, modern atrium with complex steel and glass structures.
An inspector pointing a thermal imaging camera at an electrical panel, with the heat signature visible on the screen.
The dramatic, sweeping curves of the Heydar Aliyev Center, an architectural marvel.
An inspector operating a drone, which is flying near a modern glass skyscraper.
An engineer walking through a vast, clean, and modern industrial facility or data center.
A close-up perspective of the intricate steel structure of a modern bridge.
